Sentencas: This paper addresses the off-design and transient response of a high efficiency hybrid system based on the coupling of a recuperated micro-gas turbine (mGT) with a tubular solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) reactor.
Titulo: Influence of the anodic recirculation transient behaviour on the SOFC hybrid system performance

Sentencas: The work focuses on the anodic side where an ejector exploits the pressure energy of the fuel to recirculate part of the exhaust gas, in order to maintain a proper value for the steam-to-carbon ratio (STCR) and to support the reforming reactions.
Titulo: Influence of the anodic recirculation transient behaviour on the SOFC hybrid system performance

Sentencas: Two different stand-alone time-dependent ejector models are presented and validated against experimental data.
Titulo: Influence of the anodic recirculation transient behaviour on the SOFC hybrid system performance

Sentencas: Then, the most suitable model for cycle simulations, in term of calculation time, has been employed for the transient analysis of the entire hybrid system.
Titulo: Influence of the anodic recirculation transient behaviour on the SOFC hybrid system performance

Sentencas: The SOFC hybrid system transient behaviour is presented and discussed at several operating conditions from an electrochemical, fluid dynamic and thermal point of view.
Titulo: Influence of the anodic recirculation transient behaviour on the SOFC hybrid system performance
